item.title: Sources: Eurasia Foundation
item.description: Founded in 2004 and based in Washington, DC, Eurasia Foundation works with international, national, and local partners for community action. The foundation has a variety of international and local donors. Areas of expertise include civil society, youth and leadership, media, governance, and [gender and marginalized communities] (https://www.eurasia.org/what-we-do/gender-and-marginalized-groups/).
